scripts.install:all: npm run install:api && npm run install:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run dto:generate && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start: concurrently -k -n api,web -c green,blue "npm run start:api" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:frontend
scripts.coverage:api: cd api && dotnet tool restore && dotnet test --collect:"XPlat Code Coverage" --settings coverlet.runsettings --results-directory ./TestResults && dotnet tool run reportgenerator -reports:TestResults/**/coverage.cobertura.xml -targetdir:coveragereport -reporttypes:Html
scripts.docker:dev: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:up
scripts.clean: npm run clean:api && npm run clean:frontend
